alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Harris County through 700 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spring Branch East, or over Spring Valley, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Spring Valley, Spring Branch North, Spring Branch West, northwestern Memorial Park, Hedwig Village, Hilshire Village, Spring Branch East, Spring Branch Central, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing, Langwood, Westbranch, Lazybrook / Timbergrove, Central Northwest, Greater Inwood, Carverdale, Greater Uptown and southwestern Acres Home. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
